verses.verse: And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%>, and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> Abraham in all <S%H85>things<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H2205>oldest<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, that ruled <S%H4910>over<s%> all that he <S%H7760>had<s%>, Put, I pray <S%H3027>you<s%>, your hand under my <S%H3409>thigh<s%>:

And I will make you <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, <S%H7130>among<s%> whom I <S%H3427>live<s%>:
But you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> unto my <S%H776>country<s%>, and to my <S%H4138>relatives<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H802>him<s%>, what if the woman will not be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310>me<s%> unto this <S%H776>land<s%>: must I needs <S%H7725>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> from from where you <S%H3318>came<s%>?
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8104>him<s%>, Beware you that you <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H6435>not<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> there <S%H7725>again<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, which took <S%H3947>me<s%> from my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of my <S%H4138>relatives<s%>, and which <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H7650>me<s%>, and that swore unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, Unto your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%>; he shall <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>, and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my son from <S%H1121>there<s%>.

And if the <S%H802>woman<s%> will not be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310>you<s%>, then you shall be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H7621>oath<s%>: only <S%H7725>bring<s%> not my <S%H1121>son<s%> there <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> under the <S%H3409>thigh<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%>, and <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%>.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> of the <S%H1581>camels<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%>; for all the <S%H2898>goods<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> were in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%>, unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>.

And he <S%H1288>made<s%> his <S%H1581>camels<s%> to kneel <S%H1288>down<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%>, even the <S%H6256>time<s%> that women go <S%H3318>out<s%> to draw <S%H7579>water<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, I pray <S%H6440>you<s%>, send me good <S%H7136>speed<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>.

<S%H5324>Behold<s%>, I stand here by the <S%H5869>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>; and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>:

And let it come to <S%H5291>pass<s%>, that the girl to whom I shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Let <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H3537>pitcher<s%>, I pray <S%H8354>you<s%>, that I may drink; and she shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H8354>Drink<s%>, and I will <S%H8248>give<s%> your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3198>also<s%>: let the same be she that you have appointed for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>; and thereby shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you have <S%H6213>shown<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> unto my <S%H113>master<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3615>pass<s%>, before he had done <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, <S%H7259>that<s%>, behold, Rebekah came <S%H3318>out<s%>, <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> upon her <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>.

And the <S%H5291>girl<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>fair<s%> to look <S%H4758>upon<s%>, a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, neither had any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3381>her<s%>: and she went down to the <S%H5869>well<s%>, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%>, and came <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to meet <S%H7125>her<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let <S%H1572>me<s%>, I pray you drink a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of your <S%H3537>pitcher<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8354>Drink<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>: and she <S%H4116>hurried<s%>, and let <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> upon her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and gave him <S%H8248>drink<s%>.

And when she had <S%H3615>done<s%> giving him <S%H8248>drink<s%>, she <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H7579>draw<s%> water for your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H3615>also<s%>, until they have done <S%H8354>drinking<s%>.

And she <S%H4116>hurried<s%>, and <S%H6168>emptied<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> into the <S%H8268>trough<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> again unto the <S%H875>well<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H7579>water<s%>, and drew for all his <S%H1581>camels<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7583>wondering<s%> at her held his <S%H2790>peace<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6743>made<s%> his <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> or <S%H518>not<s%>.

And it came to <S%H1581>pass<s%>, as the camels had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking<s%>, that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earring<s%> of half a <S%H1235>shekel<s%> <S%H4948>weight<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> for her <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>;

And <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4310>Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are <S%H859>you<s%>? <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H3426>me<s%>, I pray you: is there <S%H4725>room<s%> in your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for us to lodge <S%H3885>in<s%>?
And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1323>him<s%>, I am the daughter of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, which she gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> unto <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>.
She <S%H559>said<s%> moreover unto <S%H1571>him<s%>, We have both <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>fodder<s%> <S%H7227>enough<s%>, <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H4725>room<s%> to lodge <S%H3885>in<s%>.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> bowed down his <S%H6915>head<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, who has not left <S%H5800>destitute<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> of his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H571>truth<s%>: I being in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> led <S%H5148>me<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%>.
And the young <S%H5291>lady<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> them of her <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>.

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> had a <S%H251>brother<s%>, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3837>Laban<s%>: and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>, unto the <S%H5869>well<s%>.

And it came to <S%H7200>pass<s%>, when he saw the <S%H5141>earring<s%> and <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> upon his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> unto <S%H935>me<s%>; that he came unto the <S%H376>man<s%>; <S%H5975>and<s%>, behold, he stood <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> at the <S%H5869>well<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Come <S%H935>in<s%>, you <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; why <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%>? for I have <S%H6437>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4725>room<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>: and he <S%H6605>ungirded<s%> his <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>fodder<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%>'s feet that were with <S%H7272>him<s%>.

And there was <S%H7760>set<s%> food before <S%H6440>him<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>: but he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not <S%H398>eat<s%>, until I have <S%H1696>told<s%> my <S%H1697>errand<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Speak <S%H1696>on<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; and he is become <S%H1431>great<s%>: and he has <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H8198>maidservants<s%>, and <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>.

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H310>when<s%> she was <S%H2209>old<s%>: and unto him has he given all that he <S%H5414>has<s%>.

And my <S%H113>master<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, in whose <S%H776>land<s%> I <S%H3427>live<s%>:
<S%H518>But<s%> you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> unto my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and to my <S%H4940>relatives<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%>.
And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto my <S%H113>master<s%>, what if the <S%H802>woman<s%> will not follow <S%H3212>me<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>me<s%>, The Lord, <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H1980>walk<s%>, will <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> with <S%H6743>you<s%>, and prosper your <S%H1870>way<s%>; and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H4940>relatives<s%>, and of my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>:

Then shall you be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H423>oath<s%>, when you <S%H935>come<s%> to my <S%H4940>relatives<s%>; and if they <S%H5414>give<s%> not you <S%H5355>one<s%>, you shall be clear from my <S%H423>oath<s%>.

And I <S%H935>came<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H5869>well<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, if now you <S%H3426>do<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H1980>go<s%>:

<S%H5324>Behold<s%>, I stand by the <S%H5869>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>; and it shall come to <S%H5959>pass<s%>, that when the virgin comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H559>water<s%>, and I say to <S%H8248>her<s%>, Give me, I pray <S%H4592>you<s%>, a little <S%H4325>water<s%> of your <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>;

And she <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H8354>me<s%>, Both drink <S%H7579>you<s%>, and I will also draw for your <S%H1581>camels<s%>: let the same be the <S%H802>woman<s%> whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has appointed <S%H3198>out<s%> for my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And before I had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, <S%H7259>behold<s%>, Rebekah came <S%H3318>forth<s%> with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> on her <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>; and she went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H5869>well<s%>, and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H559>water<s%>: and I said unto <S%H8248>her<s%>, Let me drink, I pray you.

And she made <S%H4116>haste<s%>, and let <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> from her <S%H559>shoulder<s%>, and said, <S%H8354>Drink<s%>, and I will <S%H8248>give<s%> your <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H8354>also<s%>: so I drank, and she <S%H8248>made<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> drink <S%H8248>also<s%>.

And I <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H559>her<s%>, and said, Whose <S%H1323>daughter<s%> are <S%H559>you<s%>? And she said, The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%>, <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, whom <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> unto <S%H7760>him<s%>: and I put the <S%H5141>earring<s%> upon her <S%H639>face<s%>, and the <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> upon her <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And I bowed down my <S%H6915>head<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, which had led <S%H5148>me<s%> in the <S%H571>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> unto his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And now if you <S%H3426>will<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> with my <S%H113>master<s%>, <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H5046>me<s%>: and if not, tell <S%H6437>me<s%>; that I may turn to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

Then <S%H3837>Laban<s%> and <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: we <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto you <S%H7451>bad<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.

<S%H7259>Behold<s%>, Rebekah is before <S%H6440>you<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3212>her<s%>, and go, and let her be your <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And it came to <S%H85>pass<s%>, that, when Abraham's <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H1697>words<s%>, he <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, bowing himself to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>: he <S%H5414>gave<s%> also to her <S%H251>brother<s%> and to her <S%H517>mother<s%> precious <S%H4030>things<s%>.

And they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, he and the <S%H582>men<s%> that were with <S%H3885>him<s%>, and stayed all night; and they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Send me <S%H7971>away<s%> unto my <S%H113>master<s%>.
